admin.subtitle: Run every corner of CarbonTrack from one place

header.quickActionsHint: Use the command palette to access common tasks

hero.title: Track Your Carbon Footprint, Create a Green Future
hero.subtitle: Record your environmental actions, calculate carbon reduction, earn reward points, and contribute to Earth's environmental protection together with global users.

features.title: Why Choose CarbonTrack?
features.subtitle: We provide a complete carbon footprint tracking solution, making environmental actions simple and fun.

calculate.title: Precise Calculation
calculate.description: Based on scientific algorithms to accurately calculate your carbon reduction

rewards.title: Points Rewards
rewards.description: Earn points for environmental actions and exchange for rich prizes

tracking.title: Data Tracking
tracking.description: Visualize your environmental achievements and progress

community.title: Community Interaction
community.description: Share experiences and achievements with global environmental enthusiasts

howItWorks.title: How to Use?
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to start your environmental journey

step1.title: Record Activity
step1.description: Record your daily environmental actions, such as walking, cycling, energy saving, etc.

step2.title: Calculate Reduction
step2.description: The system automatically calculates your carbon reduction and gives point rewards

step3.title: Exchange Rewards
step3.description: Use points to exchange for environmental products or participate in public welfare activities

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Environmental Journey?
cta.subtitle: Join our community and contribute to Earth's environmental protection together with global users.

footer.description: CarbonTrack is dedicated to helping individuals and communities track and reduce their carbon footprint through actionable environmental activities.
